episodes.title: Operetta mitsumeru seirei
episodes.plot: Phoron and Corticarte arrive at the Tsuge Divine Music Player Office where they meet Maura Ren, a woman being harassed by a peeping stranger. Or at least the spirit of a peeping stranger.

episodes.title: Poruka umi no soko no wasuremono
episodes.plot: A new client comes to the Office with an interesting proposal. He needs an object retrieved from the bottom of the sea, his late father's brief case, in the hopes that its contents will settle an inheritance dispute with his brother. The problem is that his brother has hired a rival divine song player.

episodes.title: Darusênyo hajimari no hi
episodes.plot: The Yugiri twins reminisce over their father's memento and the first time they met Phoron and Eufinley at the Torvas Divine Song Players Academy. Details about their pasts are revealed, along with the musical connection between Phoron and Corticarte.

episodes.title: Affannâto uragiri no kizuna
episodes.plot: Suzuna comes to the Office believing that her spirit has breached its contract and is working for another Dantist. Eufinley takes on the assignment of investigating the matter. It is clear that the spirit is visiting a Dantist with whom it formerly had a contract with. It is not immediately clear as to why.

episodes.title: Sukerutsuo hata ni iru riyû
episodes.plot: The Tsuge Office becomes tense after a Eufinley receives a call from another Divine Music Player Office asking to have Rembart transferred to them. Phoron falls into a river and catches cold while on assignment. Eufinley sends Renbart to take over for Phoron while he recovers. Tempers flare between Perserte and Corticarte over who will care for the sick Phoron as the others worry if Renbart will leave.

episodes.title: Vaiorentsa kuroi tsuiseki-sha
episodes.plot: An old school friend of Phoron, Yamuna, comes to visit and ask him for assistance. One day at work, Yamuna found a mysterious suitcase with a One-Man Orchestra. Since then he has been followed by an even more enigmatic man and little girl dressed in black.

episodes.title: Rekuiemu utau seirei
episodes.plot: The members of the Tsuge Office are called to assist a One-Man Orchestra developer, Terero Terumin, complete his work on a new invention. The Counterfeit Rainbow he is creating will play a Commandia on its own, without a Dantist. However, Terero is killed in an accident and his spirit helper, Krista, disappears. The situation becomes more complicated as the growing anti-spirit movement begins to stir up fear and animosity in the town.
